GSP29vytrkt2u:4173_1: pratītyabhāva iti tasyārthaḥ / caturthe tṛtīyapāde“codanāyāṃ phalāśruteḥ karmamātraṃ

GSP29vytrkt2u:4173_3: aśrutaphaleṣu phalamastyuta neti saṃdehe svargādirūpādṛṣṭaphalasya śabdapramāṇakatvādiha
GSP29vytrkt2u:4173_4: ca svargādibodhakaśabdābhāvāt yāgaṃ kuryādityanvayena yajetetyasya nirākāṅkṣatayā'kāṅkṣāmūlakasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:4173_10: tadekaṃ phalamevaṃ 1 rūpamiti viśiṣyānirṇayāt punaḥ sarvārthatvameveti prāpta svargasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:4173_11: duḥkhāsaṃbhinnasukharūpatayā sarvābhilaṣitatvāt svarge evādhyāhāreṇa kalpya iti
GSP29vytrkt2u:4174: siddhāntitaṃ pūrvatantre / tathā ca tatra bhāvyatayeṣṭasāmānyākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāmeva svargarūpeṣṭaviśeṣakalpanaṃ yatkṛtaṃ tacca na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4186: nanu tathāpīṣṭasādhanatvaṃ takṣakacūḍāmaṇyāharaṇādāvapravṛtyarthaṃ kṛtisādhyatvenāvaśyaṃ viśeṣaṇīyamiti cenna /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4189_1: viśeṣaṇīyamiti // kṛtisādhyaṃ yadiṣṭasādhanaṃ tatvajñānaṃ pravartakamiti vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4189_2: takṣakacūḍāmaṇyāharaṇādikaṃ ca takṣakadaṃśana 3 bhītyā kṛtyasādhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4195: kṛtisādhyatva 1 jñānadaśāyāṃ pravṛtyāpādane iṣṭāpatteḥ / tadasādhyatvajñānadaśāyāṃ tu 2 kṛtyā phalaṃ sādhayiṣyāmīti kṛtisādhyatvaprakārikāyāḥ phalecchāyā
GSP29vytrkt2u:4196_0: abhāvādevāpravṛtteḥ / na hi sādhane kṛtyasādhyatvena jñāte phale kṛtisādhyatvaṃ jñātuṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4196_1: śakyam / na ca phalasya kṛtisādhyatvājñāne phale tatprakārikecchāyuktā / kṛtisādhyatvaviśiṣṭeṣṭasādhanatājñānaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4196_2: vā kāryatājñānaṃ vā pravartakamiti mate 'pi hi uktā phalecchā'vaśyakī /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4198_0: asādhyatvājñānadaśāyāṃ viśeṣaṇīyaṃ uta tatvena jñānakāle / ādya āha -- kṛtīti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4198_1: antye tvanyathaivāpravṛtyupapattau kiṃ viśeṣaṇenetyāha -- tadasādhyatveti // sādhanasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:4198_2: kṛtyasādhyatvajñānakāle phalecchāyā abhāva eva kuta iti cet / kṛtisādhyatvaprakārakaphalagocarecchāyāḥ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4198_5: tathāpi phalecchāyā āvaśyakatvameva kuta ityataḥ pratijñāpūrvaṃ hetumāha -- kṛtisādhyatveti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4198_6: ādyaṃ tārkikarītyoktam / antyaṃ prābhākararītyā / kuta ityata āha -- ukta iti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4204_0: ukte jñānadvaye satyapyuktaphalecchārahitasya cetanasyāpravṛtteḥ / dṛśyate hi phalaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4204_2: kṛtisādhyatvajñāne ca satyapi phalaṃ kṛtyāsādhayiṣyāmītīcchābhāvena pravṛtyabhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4205: nanvevaṃ kriyāyāḥ kṛtisādhyatvajñānamapi tvayāpi pravartakatvena svīkṛtamiti cet / satyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4208_0: cetanasyeti // spaṣṭārthaṃ jñānadvaye satītyasya ghaṭanārthaṃ veti dhyeyam / kathametadityayo
GSP29vytrkt2u:4208_1: vyanakti -- dṛśyate hīti // pravṛtyabhāva ityanvayaḥ / daivādityatrāpi vāśabdonveti /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4208_3: vetyasya vivaraṇena nirdeśaḥ -- kṛtisādhyatvajñāneceti // icchābhāveneti // icchāyā abhāvenetyarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4209_1: ityarthaḥ / pravartakatveneti // uktarūpaphalecchāṃ prati hetutvena phale kṛtisādhyatvajñānasyāṅgīkṛtatvāditi
GSP29vytrkt2u:4209_4: hṛdi kṛtvā pariharati --satyamityādinā // kena tarhi kṛtisādhyatvajñānaṃ kuto liṅgādijanyaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4209_5: netyata āha -- kriyāyā iti // yāgādirūpāyā ityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4213_0: na tu talliṅśabdajanyam / kriyāyāḥ kṛtisādhyatvasya kṛtyanvayavyatirekagamyatvena
GSP29vytrkt2u:4213_1: tatra liṅ 1 śakte rakalpanāt / na hi yajetetiśabdaḥ svargakāmasya yāgaḥ śakya ityāha /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4213_2: kintviṣṭasādhanamityeva 2 / tatra śaktaḥ pravartate / aśaktastu na / kiṃ ca kṛtisādhyatve
GSP29vytrkt2u:4213_3: satīṣṭasādhanatvaṃ na liṅarthaḥ / sādhyatvasādhanayatvayoḥ pratiyogibhedena kālabhedena 3 cāvirodhepi --
GSP29vytrkt2u:4215_1: liṅāradyartha ityucyate tathaiva pratītibalātkṛtisādhyatvamapi liṅgādyartha ityucyatāmityata
GSP29vytrkt2u:4215_2: āha -- nahīti // śakya iti // kṛtisādhya ityāhetyarthaḥ / iṣṭasādhanamityeveti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4215_3: yāga iti yojyam / evaṃ tarhi sarvepi kuto na pravartante kuto vā sarve 'pi na nivartante
GSP29vytrkt2u:4215_4: ityata āha -- tatra śakta iti // kriyāṃ kṛtyā sādhayituṃ samartha ityarthaḥ / pratītyabhāve
GSP29vytrkt2u:4215_5: vipratipannaṃ pratyāha -- kiṃ ceti // atrocyata ityādinā vidhivādasiddhāntamaṇigranthoktadiśā
GSP29vytrkt2u:4215_6: tayoravirodhamanuvadati -- sādhyatvetyādi // pratiyogīti // yadyapi - ekasya pākāderyaṃ

GSP29vytrkt2u:4230_1: pravṛtyadarśanāt / kiṃ tu svakṛtasādhyatvena / na ca śabdena svakṛtisādhyatvaṃ bodhyate /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4230_2: kiṃ tvayaṃ yāgo matkṛtisādhyo matkṛtiṃ vināsatvāt ityanumānena 1 / tathā ca pravartakaṃ

GSP29vytrkt2u:4231_3: ityanumānenaiva sarvasya siddhyā liṅa ākhyātāntaravatkṛtirevārtho na tviṣṭasādhanatvamapītyāpatteḥ //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:4233_1: tu tadupasthiteranyataḥ siddhatvānna liṅgādestadarthakatvamityāha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4235_0: 1.naiva / evaṃ ca liṅā kṛtisādhye yāge svargasādhanatvenoktemānāntareṇa ca svakṛtacisādhyatve
GSP29vytrkt2u:4235_1: buddhe svargaṃ kṛtyā sādhayiṣyāmīti phalecchāyāṃ ca satyāṃ yāge cikīrṣākṛtī bhavataḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4238: kṛtisādhyatvamapi na liṅarthaḥ / itaḥ“etadevābhipretya“itivaparyantasya sthāne ityamasti - ga.rā.su. 2.tyarthaḥ-naṃ.u.
GSP29vytrkt2u:4242: manmate tu svakṛtisādhyatvajñānaṃ na pravartakamiti nānumānāpekṣā / yāge
GSP29vytrkt2u:4243: svargasādhanatvena jñāte svasyoktāyāṃ svargecchāyāṃ ca satyāṃ pravṛttāvavatilambāt / tasmātkṛtisādhyatvamapi na liṅarthaḥ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4247_0: pravṛttikāraṇāni niṣkṛṣyāha -- evaṃ ceti // svakṛtisādhyatvajñānasyānumānikatve satītyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4247_1: pravṛttiśabdārthavivaraṇaṃ cikīrṣākṛtī bhavata iti / upasaṃharati -- tasmāditi //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4247_2: tasmāditi parāmṛṣṭaṃ hetutrayaṃ vyanakti -- āvaśyaketyādinā // iti phalecchayeti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4247_5: svārājyakāmo yajete“tyādau yaji 1 noktayāgasya uddeśyatvānuvādyatvaprādhānyarūpa dharmatrayaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4249_1: yatrikadvayaṃ tasya yāge āpātācceti kiṃ cetyādinoktahetvuvādaḥ / api cetyādinoktasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:4257_0: kṛtisādhyeṣṭasādhanatāyāḥ kāryatā 1 paryāyatvāditi niṣṇutatvanirṇayaṭīkāyā ca saha
GSP29vytrkt2u:4257_1: virodha iti vācyam / sudhayā nirṇayaṭīkāyabhyāmuktāṃ mānāntarajasya kṛtisādhyatvajñānasya pravṛttihetutāṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4259: ata eva karmanirṇaye liṅādyarthastviṣṭasādhanatvameveti liṅādesttviṣṭasādhanatārthatvenaiva kṛtārthatvamiti coktam / taṭṭīkāyāmapi kṛtisādhyatāyāḥ --
GSP29vytrkt2u:4261_0: jñānāditi // liṅgādiśabdajanyāditi śeṣaḥ / iti karmanirṣayaṭīkayeti // na ca siddher'thache
GSP29vytrkt2u:4261_2: tatvanirṇayaṭīkayeti /“jñātvaiva hīṣṭasādhanatāṃ pravartate / nivartate ca viparyayeṇe“tyetavdyākhyānarūpetyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4261_4: liṅarthatvamātraniṣedhaparatve jñānapakamāha -- ata eveti // kṛtisādhyatvasya liṅādyarthatvābhāvādavetyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4268: etadapyuktamiṣṭasādhanatāmeveti / na tu kṛtisādhyatvaviśeṣitāmityarthaḥ/ śabdādita śeṣaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4270_0: kṛtisādhyatvasya liṅādyarthatvābhāvena tajjñānajanakasya kasya cidapi śabdasyābhāvādeva
GSP29vytrkt2u:4270_3: liṅādivācyayā sākaṃ yāgādikriyāniṣṭhatvamātraṃ kṛtisādhyatvasyoktam / na tu tasyāpi
GSP29vytrkt2u:4271_2: aikārthyaghaṭanāya tatvanirṇayavākye 'dhyāhāramāha - śabdāditi śeṣa iti // liṅādiśabdādiṣṭasādhanatāmeva
GSP29vytrkt2u:4271_3: jñātvā pravartata iti tatvanirṇayavākyārtha iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4272_0: etena -- karmanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ kṛtisādhyatvaṃ pravartakajñānakoṭau na praveśitam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4272_2: praveśāttasyāpi pravartakajñānaviṣayakauṭau praveśaḥ kṛtaḥ / iti nirṇayaṭīkayorvirodha
GSP29vytrkt2u:4278_0: yadvā śabdajanyamiṣṭasādhanatvajñānameva pravartakaṃ mānāntarajanyaṃ yāgādeḥ kṛtisādhyatvajñānaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:4278_1: tu phalaṃ kṛtyā sādhayiṣyāmīti kṛtisādhyatvaprakārikā yāvaśyakī phalecchā tadutpādanopakṣīṇam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4278_2: na tu pravartakam / tathā ca sudhā kṛtisādhyatvajñānasya sākṣādupayoganiṣedhikā nirṇayaṭīke
GSP29vytrkt2u:4279_1: tu mānāntarajanyaṃ kṛtyasādhyatvajñānaṃ pratibandhakamiti kṛtisādhyatvajñānaṃ pratabandhakanirāsāpekṣaṇim /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4282_0: liṅādijanyaṃ tadityeva nābhimatamityupetya virodhaḥ parihṛtaḥ / adhunā kṛtisādhyatvajñānasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:4282_1: sākṣātpravṛttihetutvaṃ na kvāpyabhimatamityupetya virodhaṃ prakārāntareṇa nirāha
GSP29vytrkt2u:4284_2: kṛtisādhyatvajñānasya vā kṛtisādhyatvaprakārakaphalecchāya vā vidhaṭaneneti vācyamiti
GSP29vytrkt2u:4284_3: pūrvoktadiśā phalecchādvārā pravṛtyupayoga eva yuktaḥ / evaṃ sati nirṇayadvayaṭīkāsthapravṛttipadaprayogasvārasyaṃ ceti dhyeyam //
GSP29vytrkt2u:4288: pratibindhakābhāvaśca sarvakāryāpekṣitaḥ / evaṃ ca sudhā kṛtisādhyatvajñānasyānanyathā siddhiniṣedhikā / nirṇayaṭīke tu upayogamātrāstitvapare iti na virodha ityāhuḥ//
